title: D.t.B
author: D.t.B
content: Hello guys,we'll be launching an exclusive $500 Crash challenge in cooperation with CrashinoRULES-Challenge period - July 1 - July 7-Qualifying games - All Crash games-Players will be ranked by accumulated multipliers (sum of all multipliers >10x)-Min. multiplier to qualify 10x-Min. Bet $0.1/â‚¬0.1-Post your results (screenshot) with your Crashino ID-Only players signed up at Crashino.com with the DTB link may participate in the challenge  (Here)You can do soBitcointalk - in this threadTwitter - Reply to the tweet - https://twitter.com/2xthebitcoin/status/1542626472401199111 By email - challenge@doublethebitcoin.netPRIZES (sent to Crashino acc)1st - $3002nd - $1503rd - $50Image with complete Info >>>Or head to DoubleTheBitcoinHave Fun and Good Luck

comments.author: teddybu
comments.body: Can you only make it transparency please?Make it being one, like those applies only posted at bitcointalk.Given BET ID to email just make unclear.Â  We don'tÂ  know about the truth.

comments.author: D.t.B
comments.body: Sorry, I get your concerns.But this time the challenge will be for a broader audience, thus more options to post players' results.

comments.author: D.t.B
comments.body: Guys, the challenge is extended till July 9. Yes, you've got two more days to scoop $300 for yourself as there have been ZERO participants so far.As there are three channels to submit results I'll let you know if there are any submits done via Twitter or email.GOOD LUCK

comments.author: D.t.B
comments.body: Hey guys,last day of the challengeâ—There's still a chance to get a piece of the prize pool. We've got only one participant till this moment.The player has submitted his results via Twitter (over 100x total multiplier, results on imgur)ğŸ€GOOD LUCKğŸ€
